**Use library function to load the required packages**
```{r}
library(palmerpenguins) #palmerpenguins dataset
library(ggplot2) 
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(janitor))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dplyr))
library(svglite)
```
